question: Gautam H. Bambawale was appointed as next ambassador to which country?
explanation: India's High Commissioner to Pakistan, Gautam H. Bambawale was appointed as next ambassador to People's Republic of China. Gautam H. Bambawale is an Indian Foreign Service Officer (IFS) of batch 1984. He is presently the High Commissioner of India to the Islamic Republic of Pakistan. Bambawale will replace Vijay Gokhale in China as ambassador.
